Interface IConfigurationFactory

Provides configuration collections specific to the given emulator.

Namespace: Snowflake.Execution.Extensibility
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IConfigurationFactory

Properties

InputMappings

Gets the input mappings for this emulator adapter.

This should be specified in JSON input mapping format, in the InputMappings directory under the plugin resource folder.

The general convention for these files are common/InputMapping/DEVICE_NAME

Declaration
IEnumerable<IInputMapping> InputMappings { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<IInputMapping>

Methods

GetConfiguration()

Gets the default valid set of configuration required to launch this emulator for a given game record.

Declaration
IConfigurationCollection GetConfiguration()
Returns
Type Description
IConfigurationCollection

A set of configuration collection keyed on the expected file names of the configuration files.

GetConfiguration(Guid, String)

Gets the valid set of configuration required to launch this emulator for a given game record.

Declaration
IConfigurationCollection GetConfiguration(Guid gameRecord, string profileName = "default")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Guid gameRecord

The GUID of the game that is associated with this set of configuration collections
System.String profileName

The profile name to get configuration for. By default, the profile name must be 'default'
Returns
Type Description
IConfigurationCollection

A set of configuration collection keyed on the expected file names of the configuration files.
See Also
IConfigurationCollectionStore

GetInputMappings(IEmulatedController)

Gets the input template for the given emulated controller port.

Declaration
GetInputMappings(IEmulatedController emulatedDevice)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IEmulatedController emulatedDevice

The given device to create an input template for.
Returns
Type Description
System.

A valid input template for the given emulated device details.
